source_sentence: 【增收】潭州報慈藏嶼禪師(嗣龍牙)僧問。
translation: [Zengzhao] The Chan Master Yuzizang Lan (successor Longya) of Tanzhou asked the monks.

He hasn't met anyone yet.

source_sentence: 【增收】襄州萬銅山廣德延禪師(嗣青林虔)僧問。

source_sentence: 物外獨騎千里象萬年松下擊金鐘。
